change.changenote: Schedule, section 68 (2) (part) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 117/2021, effective May 1, 2021.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: For certainty, the percentage in column 2 applies if the tinnitus is unilateral or bilateral. Glossopharyngeal, vagal and hypoglossal impairment

change.changenote: Schedule, section 155 (2) (b) (i) (C) and (D) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 117/2021, effective May 1, 2021.

bcl:clause.bcl:text: if applicable, the percentages determined in accordance with subparagraphs (A) and (B) are added together;
